name: John Deere Stock Tracker
desc: Automated application built in Python to show changes in John Deere stock using Alpha Vantage API, News API, and Twilio API.

name: Personal Website
desc: Personal Website built with HTML, CSS, and Javascript to display personal info skill, projects, experience, and contact links.

name: Calculator
desc: Simple and interactive calculator application built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

name: To-do List
desc: Simple To-do list application Built with PHP, HTML, and CSS. Allows user to add tasks and categories. Everything is stored in a MySQL Database.
